item.title: 'Sozialpläne' in Swiss Law – Recent Developments
item.description: An article by Christian Gersbach and myself has been published in Festschrift for Adrian von Kaenel, in which we trace current developments in social plans in Swiss Law. You can access a preview here (article in German): Gersbach/Winter: Sozialpläne – Aktuelle Entwicklungen If you have any questions about employment law in general or social compensation plans in particular, feel free to contact me!
